List packages that fgeo imports and suggests.

Source: R/fgeo_pkgs.R

List packages that fgeo imports and suggests.

fgeo_packages(include_self = TRUE, section = c("Imports", "Suggests"))

fgeo_imports(include_self = TRUE)

fgeo_suggests()

Arguments

include_self

Include fgeo in the list?
section

Either "Imports" or "Suggests".

Examples

fgeo_packages(TRUE, "Imports")
#>  [1] "bciex"           "cli"             "crayon"          "dplyr"          
#>  [5] "fgeo.abundance"  "fgeo.demography" "fgeo.habitat"    "fgeo.map"       
#>  [9] "fgeo.tool"       "magrittr"        "purrr"           "remotes"        
#> [13] "rlang"           "rstudioapi"      "utils"           "fgeo"           
# Same
fgeo_imports()
#>  [1] "bciex"           "cli"             "crayon"          "dplyr"          
#>  [5] "fgeo.abundance"  "fgeo.demography" "fgeo.habitat"    "fgeo.map"       
#>  [9] "fgeo.tool"       "magrittr"        "purrr"           "remotes"        
#> [13] "rlang"           "rstudioapi"      "utils"           "fgeo"           

fgeo_suggests()
#> [1] "covr"      "knitr"     "rmarkdown" "testthat"
